name: telemetric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the science or process of collecting information about objects that are far away and sending the information somewhere electronically: telemetric technology See
telemetry
More examplesFewer examplesThe car key is a telemetric device that relays information about the car, including whether the alarm has been activated in your absence.Mountain lions wandered the high rocks with telemetric collars around their necks.devices such as telemetric health monitoring systemsTelemetric signals are sent to the offshore gas platforms.
